title: BIOTONE Deep Tissue Massage Lotion, Rich Texture, Lasting Glide, Use for Swedish, Trigger Point, Sports, and Deep Tissue, Smooth Application, Unscented
features: DEEP TISSUE MASSAGE LOTION VERSATILE AND UNSCENTED.
REQUIRES LESS REAPPLICATIONS without leaving an oily or greasy feel.
GIVES THE PERFECT BALANCE OF GLIDE AND DRAG for superior workability.
SOOTHING INGREDIENTS, skin benefits, and water-dispersible for easy wash-out.
CRUELTY-FREE AND MADE IN THE UNITED STATES.
description: Perfect for treating deep, knotted muscles and trigger points. Deep-Tissue Lotion is formulated with a non-greasy texture to give you complete control with maximum friction and minimum glide without drag or tackiness that limits workability. Contains natural oils and Aloe Vera.Features of Paraben-free. Formulated especially for deep-tissue work.

title: The Benefits of Relax Massage Lotion
